athena:
Single electron 5GeV, pu0, run2 chains ElectronSlice-single e 5GeV, pu0, run2 chains EventMax=10000;runMergedChain=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_ElectronSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_el_sample0.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-electron-merge.root -p 11 -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-merge.root data-electron-merge-reference.root EF_e24vh_medium1_IDTrkNoCut_IDT_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma EF_e24vh_medium1_IDTrkNoCut_IDT_InDetTrigParticleCreation_Electron_EFID -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-merge.root data-electron-merge-lowpt-reference-newchains.root HLT_e5_loose_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e5_loose_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-merge.root data-electron-merge-lowpt-reference-newchains.root HLT_e5_loose_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_0 HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_2 -d HLTL2-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
TIDAdata*.dat data-electron-merge-reference.root data-electron-merge-lowpt-reference-newchains.root expert-monitoring-el_single_e_5_run2-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" Test_bin.dat
